description:
ULTIMATE SURRENDER SEASON NINE!
BERETTA JAMES

Sexy tiny Beretta James is now on the Ultimate Surrender roster. This feisty rookie is strong, fast and determined to do well. Once she gets the experience we feel she will make a serious run for the Feather weight champion. However today is not that day.
Gia DiMarko is back, this tough, tiny girl loves Ultimate Surrender and loves kicking the shit out of rookies. Gia is undefeated in the featherweight division and looks to improve her record today.
This was a brutal match up. Gia dominated early and often. From facesits, to crushing leg scissors, Gia took control of the match. Beretta learned quickly but not fast enough. She was totally dominated physically, sexually and mentally as Gia Destroyed her. In RD4 Gia took it to her hard. Brutal face fucking and deep hard fucking. Beretta was moaning and cumming like a whore. Welcome to Ultimate Surrender!
title: 2 hot wrestlers battle in the featherweight division!
